text:
SALEM

The District Administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Sampath, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Salem College of Engineering and Technology: Department of Training and Placement, career guidance programme, aptitude and soft skill training programme by Campus Interaction, Chennai, R. A. Sankaran, Principal, presides,

9.30 a.m.

V.M. K. V. Engineering College and Vibrant Technologies, Chennai: Aptitude and soft skills training for final year students,

9 a.m.

District Employment Exchange: Free coaching camp for the candidates appearing for TNPSC VAO examinations, 10 a.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Tamil Nadu Handicrafts Development Corporation Limited: Exhibition of ornaments and spiritual products, Anna Pattu Malagai complex, 10 a.m.

Handicrafts Expo: Exhibition of wooden handicrafts of western Uttar Pradesh, National Hotel, 9 a.m. to

9 p.m.

Department of School Education: National level under 19 years football tournament for girls, semi finals, Suramangalam Neelambal Subramaniam Higher Secondary School, 7 a.m. and finals, 3 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Krishi Vigyan Kendra: Training programme on ornamental fish farming, Veterinary College and Research Institute, 10 a.m.

District administration: Grievances day meeting, V. Dakshinamoorthy, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Gnanamani Educational Institutions: Recruitment drive by Think and Learn Private Limited, Bengaluru, T. Arangannal, Chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

Mahendra Engineering College: Department of Computer Science, Umapathy Venkatachalam, Software Developer, Microsoft Corporation, USA, speaks on ‘Azure’, M. G. Bharathkumar, Chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal Engineering College: Department of EEE, seminar on ‘yoga’, 10 a.m.
title: engagements
